name: Wobbuffet
description: The Patient Pokémon. Wobbuffet does nothing but endure attacks-it won't attack on its own. However, it won't endure an attack on its tail. When that happens, the Pokémon will try to take the foe with it using Destiny Bond.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: Creatures within 50 feet of this Pokémon may not flee or switch out, except by item, Move, or ability.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
